name: Simon's Cube
description:
You wake up inside a cube of cubes with only your clone gun.

The last thing you remember is Simon knocking you out.

Create clones and use them to lead the guards to their demise.

Find your way out of Simon's Cube...

A psuedo-stealth/roguelite game where you have to create a clone that moves in a specific direction in order to attract the attention of the guard, leading them to a trap. Complete enough rooms to make it out of Simon's Cube!

Made by myself in Unity for Becker College's 48 hour Asset Jam.
